short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-hide message box from LinkedIn messages.
short.es: Oculta automáticamente el cuadro de mensajes de LinkedIn.
short.fr: Réduis automatiquement la boîte de messages de LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedHide is a user-friendly and efficient Chrome extension designed to enhance your LinkedIn experience by auto-hiding the annoying message box that appears when you open a page. 

With LinkedHide, you can enjoy a clutter-free and distraction-free browsing experience on LinkedIn, allowing you to focus on what matters most – building connections, networking, and exploring professional opportunities.
